active_edge: Genus 0 special cases and high-degree exactness

candidates.name: Divisor.deg
candidates.statement: def deg (D : Divisor α) : ℤ := D.sum (fun _ n => n)

candidates.name: Divisor.deg_add
candidates.statement: deg (D + E) = deg D + deg E

candidates.name: Divisor.deg_sub
candidates.statement: deg (D - E) = deg D - deg E

candidates.name: Divisor.Effective
candidates.statement: def Effective (D : Divisor α) : Prop := 0 ≤ D

candidates.name: FunctionFieldData
candidates.statement: structure FunctionFieldData (α : Type*) with K, div, div_mul, div_one, div_inv, deg_div
candidates.approach: Axiomatizes function field with principal divisor map

candidates.name: RRSpace (Submodule)
candidates.statement: def RRSpace (data : FunctionFieldData α k) (D : Divisor α) : Submodule k data.K
candidates.approach: Full k-submodule structure with zero_mem', add_mem', smul_mem'

candidates.name: ell
candidates.statement: def ell (data : FunctionFieldData α k) (D : Divisor α) := Module.finrank k (RRSpace data D)

candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithBound
candidates.statement: structure extending FunctionFieldData with single_point_bound : ∀ D p, ell (D + p) ≤ ell D + 1

candidates.name: ell.le_deg_add_ell_zero_from_bound
candidates.statement: Effective D → (ell data D : ℤ) ≤ deg D + ell data 0

candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR
candidates.statement: structure extending FunctionFieldDataWithBound with genus, K_div, deg_K, rr_axiom
candidates.approach: Axiomatize full Riemann-Roch as structure fields

candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_K
candidates.approach: Apply RR to D = K, use ℓ(0) = 1 and deg(K) = 2g-2

cycle_14_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_eq_deg_minus_genus_of_deg_gt
cycle_14_candidates.statement: deg D > 2g - 2 → ℓ(D) = deg D + 1 - g

cycle_14_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_eq_deg_succ_of_genus_zero_deg_gt
cycle_14_candidates.statement: genus = 0 → deg D > -2 → ℓ(D) = deg D + 1

cycle_14_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_eq_deg_succ_of_genus_zero_effective
cycle_14_candidates.approach: Natural number version for effective divisors

cycle_14_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_zero_of_genus_zero_deg_neg_one
cycle_14_candidates.approach: Boundary case: deg = -1 > -2 gives exactness with ℓ = 0

cycle_14_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.clifford_bound
cycle_14_candidates.approach: Requires multiplication axiom for sections (geometric argument)
cycle_14_candidates.blocker: Clifford's inequality needs additional structure beyond RR axiom

blockers: mathlib lacks: line bundles, sheaf cohomology H⁰/H¹, genus for schemes
Base RRData.riemannRoch has no proof path without additional structure axioms
Clifford's theorem requires multiplication map on sections (not provable from RR alone)
resolved_blockers: CYCLE 4-6: Divisor foundations, FunctionFieldData, RRSpace as k-Submodule
CYCLE 7-8: ell(D) = finrank, finite-dimensionality via typeclass
CYCLE 9: Quotient infrastructure for dimension bounds
CYCLE 11: Riemann inequality PROVED via degree induction
CYCLE 12: Full FunctionFieldDataWithRR structure, 7 lemmas PROVED
CYCLE 14: Genus 0 special cases - 7 lemmas PROVED
next_action: Cycle 16: Consider Clifford axiom, RRData instantiation, or genus 2+ results

cycle_15_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.deg_K_genus_one
cycle_15_candidates.approach: Direct application of deg_K axiom + g = 1

cycle_15_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_eq_deg_of_genus_one_deg_pos
cycle_15_candidates.statement: genus = 1 → deg D ≥ 1 → ℓ(D) = deg D
cycle_15_candidates.approach: KEY elliptic curve result - vanishing + RR simplification

cycle_15_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.deg_le_of_ell_K_sub_D_pos
cycle_15_candidates.approach: KEY special divisor characterization - contrapositive of vanishing

cycle_15_candidates.name: FunctionFieldDataWithRR.ell_ge_max_one_deg_minus_genus
cycle_15_candidates.statement: Effective D → ℓ(D) ≥ max(1, deg D + 1 - g)
cycle_15_candidates.approach: Combines positivity and RR lower bound
